name: mateo-marketplace
description: Curated Claude Code plugins for embedded development, documentation generation, and developer productivity

plugins.name: coding-standard-c-zephyr
plugins.description: Complete C/Zephyr RTOS coding standard with 50+ rules covering naming, types, memory, concurrency, error handling, security, and more. Includes clang-format, clang-tidy, and cppcheck configurations.

plugins.name: docs-diagrams-code
plugins.description: Generate accurate, reproducible Mermaid diagrams from Go source code. Supports architecture, sequence, dependency, and type relationship diagrams.

plugins.name: docs-presentations-business
plugins.description: Generate branded Slidev presentations from business strategy documents. Three-phase pipeline: scan existing markdown, propose a deck plan, then render with parallel agents. Includes 14 slide templates and a full design system.

plugins.name: docs-presentations-code
plugins.description: Generate purpose-driven Slidev presentations for libraries and tools. Three-phase pipeline: discover the codebase with parallel agents, propose a deck plan, then generate branded presentations.

plugins.name: extension-toolkit
plugins.description: Toolkit for creating and managing Claude Code extensions. Includes commands for creating skills, rules, commands, agents, and hooks, plus meta-skills for extension lifecycle management.

plugins.name: system-create
plugins.description: The skill factory. Creates production-grade Claude Code extensions through guided architecture, web research, implementation, and adversarial review. Produces skills, agents, hooks, MCP configs, and commands that meet a verified quality bar.

plugins.name: zephyr-bugfix
plugins.description: End-to-end bug-fix workflow for Zephyr RTOS firmware on Nordic nRF52/nRF53 hardware. Uses MTIB test bench for flashing, debugging, UART/RTT logs, and power measurement. Phases: receive bug, reproduce on hardware, diagnose fault, fix, verify with tests and power, ship to Bitbucket.
